summary:
The token that is worth gold! - At Gold Mining you buy mining-backed tokens in a simple, fast, online way with the security of the blockchain.

 Sign up for our newsletter - Sign up on our platform and receive all the news and exclusive news about Gold Mining.

 Discover a new way to invest - With low cost, you can have a mining-backed token easily and without bureaucracy, in addition to trading and transacting 24/7.

 Learn more about Gold Mining - Gold Mining is a startup specialized in leasing productive gold mining areas, which helps small gold miners to be more efficient in extraction. Furthermore, it is the first project in the world that uses blockchain and tokenization to scale gold mining activities.

 Discover some reasons to invest in gold - Safety, Growth, Liquidity, Valuable

 Companies that trust our work - Gold Mining Partners

 Why buy Gold Coin? - Gold Mining creates ballast in the production of miners, you receive gold monthly as part of the payment in the Gold Coin token. Gold backing with blockchain security.

 How does the Gold Mining token work - Gold Mining, fecha parceria de arrendamento de área para mineração com minerador. Contrato, Venda de tokens, Recursos, Estruturação, Implementação, Extração, Gold Coin, Detentores, Mineradora, Separação

 ROADMAP - Whitepaper, Whitepaper launch in November, Channels, First step, Pre-Launch and Launch, Distribution, Exchange listing, Production, Payment, Virtual store, Mining
